sobre.paragrafo1: Hello! I'm a Quality Assurance professional passionate about ensuring the best possible user experience. With experience in manual and automated testing, I work to ensure that each product meets the highest quality standards.
sobre.paragrafo2: I have a great interest in UX/UI, always seeking to understand how users interact with products to improve the quality of tests and contribute to a more intuitive and efficient experience.
sobre.paragrafo3: I'm also a gaming enthusiast, which helps me better understand the importance of user experience and quality in interactive products.

experiencia.descricao1_1: Implementation and execution of automated tests
experiencia.descricao1_2: Development of testing strategies and executions for Salesforce
experiencia.descricao1_3: Collaboration with development and business teams
experiencia.descricao1_4: Identification and documentation of bugs and improvements
experiencia.descricao2_1: Management of the life cycle of automated test scenarios and cases
experiencia.descricao2_2: Creation and management of Automated Test Pipeline
experiencia.descricao2_3: Creation and maintenance of test cases
experiencia.descricao2_4: Strategic alignments with the Software Architecture team

projetos.projeto1_descricao: Implementation of test automation framework for e-commerce web application using Selenium and Java.
projetos.projeto2_descricao: UX Research / UI and Site Prototyping in Figma focusing on user experience and usability.
projetos.projeto3_descricao: Conducting tests identifying points for improvement in user experience, persona studies, product ownership, planning and MVP.

uxui.paragrafo: My experience in Quality Assurance has given me a unique perspective on the importance of user experience. Working closely with UX/UI teams has allowed me to develop skills to identify usability issues and suggest improvements that positively impact the end experience.
uxui.item3: Collaboration with designers to improve user flows
uxui.item5: Analysis of user feedback for continuous improvements

jogos.paragrafo1: My passion for games goes beyond entertainment - it's a source of inspiration for my QA work. Games represent one of the most challenging environments for testing, combining technical complexity with high user experience expectations.
jogos.subtitulo: How my passion for games influences my work:
jogos.item1: Deep understanding of the importance of user experience
jogos.item2: Attention to details that can impact immersion
jogos.item3: Appreciation for the balance between functionality and fun
jogos.item4: Recognition of the importance of rigorous testing
jogos.item5: Appreciation for intuitive and responsive interfaces
jogos.paragrafo2: This passion motivates me to constantly seek excellence in my QA projects, applying lessons learned from the gaming world to improve the quality of any digital product.

depoimentos.depoimento1_texto: "Vladimir is an exceptional QA professional. His attention to detail and ability to identify issues before they affect end users is impressive. He not only finds bugs but also suggests improvements that elevate product quality."
depoimentos.depoimento2_texto: "Working with Vladimir was an enriching experience. His methodical approach to testing and his deep understanding of user experience brought a new perspective to our team. He is a true advocate for quality in all aspects."
depoimentos.depoimento3_texto: "Vladimir's technical knowledge combined with his passion for games brings a unique perspective to projects. He deeply understands how to create engaging user experiences and ensure that every interaction is perfect."
